game.name: D.A.D.S.
game.shortDescription: Use your special ops units to construct base facilities and towers to protect them from the ever-increasing threat of alien invaders in this Tower Defense game with a city-building element! Research their weaknesses and develop defenses before mankind runs out of time.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Use your special ops units to construct base facilities and towers to protect them from the ever-increasing threat of alien invaders in this Tower Defense game with a city-building element! Research their weaknesses and develop defenses before mankind runs out of time.
